name: LOST POEM
description:
lOST POEM  The game tell the story of a lost poem.  In the center of the plot is a crumpled piece of paper, revived by a poem written on it and trying to find fragments of the work that are in the air. The author wrote a poem, but in a fit of anger tore and crumple a sheet of paper, and then completely threw it off roof.  GAMEPLAY   You play as a wad of paper falling down and trying to pick up pieces of work in flight. At the end of the round, the lump that picked up all the scraps of paper falls into a puddle and opens up revealing the author's complete work. If the player did not collect all the pieces of paper, he lost.       
TUTORIAL
